name: pulsar-typescript-updated
description: The only TypeScript plugin you will ever need.

scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development parcel watch --target main lib/main/atomts.ts
scripts.build: npm run gen-config-types && cross-env NODE_ENV=production parcel build --target main lib/main/atomts.ts
scripts.test: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run prettier-check

unusedAsInfo.title: Show unused values with severity info
unusedAsInfo.description: Show unused values with severity 'info' instead of 'error'

checkAllFilesOnSave.title: Check all project files on save
checkAllFilesOnSave.description: Enabling this will report all problems in the current project when the current file is saved (this can be slow if the project is big!).

autocompletionSuggestionPriority.description: Snippets etc have priority of 1. Requires Atom restart

autocompletionInclusionPriority.description: Inclusion priority as described in autocomplete-plus docs <https://github.com/atom/autocomplete-plus/wiki/Provider-API>. Requires Atom restart

autocompletionExcludeLowerPriority.description: Exclude providers with priority lower than inclusion priority. Set to true to exclude builtin suggestions. Requires Atom restart

autocompletionUseFuzzyFilter.description: Use fuzzy-filter, like the one used by autocomplete-plus by default. If disabled, use a custom strict one

autocompletionStrictFilterIgnoreCase.description: When using strict filter, include suggestions with mismatching case

autocompletionStrictFilterLongestMatchFi.description: When using strict filter, offer the longest match first; otherwise, offer the shortest match first

locale.title: TypeScript locale
locale.description: Use this locale for TypeScript messages (e.g. 'de'). Requires Atom restart

buildStatusTimeout.title: Build status visibility timeout
buildStatusTimeout.description: How long to show successful build status, in seconds. Failed status will be shown indefinitely. Negative means forever

getErrDebounceTimeout.title: getErr Debounce Timeout
getErrDebounceTimeout.description: During on-change check, how long to wait for new changes until checking for errors, in ms

showSemanticView.title: Show semantic view
showSemanticView.description: Show semantic view (outline) for typescript content

autocompleteParens.title: Autocomplete parentheses
autocompleteParens.description: Automatically insert parentheses after autocompleting functions and methods

includeCompletionsForModuleExports.description: (EXPERIMENTAL) If enabled, TypeScript will search through all external modules' exports and add them to the completions list. This affects lone identifier completions but not completions on the right hand side of `obj.`.

importModuleSpecifierEnding.description: Determines whether we import `foo/index.ts` as "foo", "foo/index", or "foo/index.js"

tsdkPath.title: Path to default TypeScript SDK
tsdkPath.description: TypeScript SDK found at the specified path will be preferred over the bundled one if TypeScript is not installed in node_modules as a project dependency. Ignored when empty

ignoredDiagnosticCodes.title: Ignore diagnostics
ignoredDiagnosticCodes.description: List of diagnostic codes to ignore, comma-separated. Refer to [diagnosticMessages.json](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/blob/master/src/compiler/diagnosticMessages.json) for diagnostic codes

ignoreUnusedSuggestionDiagnostics.title: Ignore 'unused parameter/variable/etc' suggestion diagnostics
ignoreUnusedSuggestionDiagnostics.description: When `noUnusedLocals` etc are disabled, TypeScript 2.9 and above still report this as 'suggestions'. This option will filter these out

ignoreNonSuggestionSuggestionDiagnostics.title: Ignore suggestion diagnostics that are not actionable suggestions
ignoreNonSuggestionSuggestionDiagnostics.description: TypeScript server reports some error-type diagnostics on the suggestion channel. Enabling this option will suppress those

ignoredSuggestionDiagnostics.title: Ignore suggestion diagnostics
ignoredSuggestionDiagnostics.description: List of suggestion-type diagnostic codes to ignore, comma-separated. Refer to [diagnosticMessages.json](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/blob/master/src/compiler/diagnosticMessages.json) for diagnostic codes

suppressAllDiagnostics.title: Suppress all diagnostics
suppressAllDiagnostics.description: The package will not report any problems with TypeScript. Use only if you know what you are doing

tsFileExtensions.title: TypeScript file extensions
tsFileExtensions.description: Comma-separated list of TypeScript file extensions; may require Atom restart to take effect; DO NOT EDIT unless you know what you are doing

jsFileExtensions.title: JavaScript file extensions
jsFileExtensions.description: Comma-separated list of JavaScript file extensions; may require Atom restart to take effect; DO NOT EDIT unless you know what you are doing

extensionsFromGrammars.title: Determine file extensions from Atom grammar settings
extensionsFromGrammars.description: Pull recognized file extensions from grammar definitions matching the syntax scopes defined below

tsSyntaxScopes.title: TypeScript syntax scopes
tsSyntaxScopes.description: Comma-separated list of TypeScript syntax scopes; may require Atom restart to take effect; DO NOT EDIT unless you know what you are doing

jsSyntaxScopes.title: JavaScript syntax scopes
jsSyntaxScopes.description: Comma-separated list of JavaScript syntax scopes; may require Atom restart to take effect; DO NOT EDIT unless you know what you are doing

tsserverInstancePerTsconfig.title: Spawn separate tsserver instance for each tsconfig.json
tsserverInstancePerTsconfig.description: This option helps avoid confusion when multiple projects are referincing the same file, but can prevent external definition files (d.ts) from reloading when changed. Changing this option requires Atom restart.

longLineLength.title: Single line length that triggers semantic view large file optimizations
longLineLength.description: Will throttle semantic view updates on the file if any one line is longer than this number; value of 0 means getting the value from the corresponding setting in linter-ui-default, or 4000 if that is unavaliable

largeFileLineCount.title: Number of lines that triggers semantic view large file optimizations
largeFileLineCount.description: Will throttle semantic view updates on the file if it has more lines than this number; value of 0 means getting the value from the corresponding setting in linter-ui-default, or 500 if that is unavaliable

largeFileNoFollowCursor.title: Disable semantic view focus following text cursor on large files
largeFileNoFollowCursor.description: If a file is large, as defined by previous options, don't update semantic view focus on text cursor moves; use typescript:reveal-in-semantic-view command instead
